name: Neon Product Designer
author: Vertim Coders

sections.description:
About the neon configurator

  • Plugin site: neon-configurator.vertimcoders.com

Overview

The best WooCommerce product customizer for neon signs.

NPD allows you to extend your business of personalization of neon signs by offering you a configurator to allow your customers to customize online prior to order their custom neon sign. Easy and quick to set up.

Our Woocommerce Neon Products Designer is built using WordPress best practices both on the front and the back end. This results in an efficient, robust and intuitive plugin. It’s works with any theme, including the default WordPress themes and the last Woocommerce version.

Features

  • Custom TTF fonts support
  • Custom colors palette for limited colors usage
  • Translation ready
  • Custom editor background
  • Shortcode available
  • Design data in cart
  • Description tooltip
  • Responsive and user-friendly

Pro features

  • Configurable design dimensions with additional price
  • Configurable Additional Options with additional price
  • Edit design from cart
  • Configurable more units for text size
  • Configurable Font display
  • And more available from custom job

Live Demo

DEMO CUSTOM NEON SIGN PRODUCT.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.0 or greater
  • Woocommerce version 3.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Neon Product Designer, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Neon Product Designer” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download `neon-product-designer.zip`
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select `neon-product-designer.zip` from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download `neon-product-designer.zip`
  2. Extract the `neon-product-designer` directory to your computer
  3. Upload the `neon-product-designer` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use automatic update to update the plugin safely.
sections.faq:
Where can I find Neon Product Designer documentation and user guides

The plugin contains a User Manual.pdf to help you start. You can also access our online documentation here

If you get stuck you can open a ticket here.

Will Neon Product Designer work with my theme?

Neon Product Designer works with any theme, including the default WordPress themes.

    -Remove special note field
    -Remove download button

1.0

  • Initial release version

short_description: NPD is a WordPress/WooCommerce plugin that helps you set up your online custom neon sign store, and receives orders from your customers.
